description: This is a Dart source file implementing the UI for a calculator screen in a Flutter app. It includes layout logic, theming, custom toggle switch, and button arrangements but does not include calculation logic.

classes.name: CalculatorScreen
classes.description: StatelessWidget that builds the main calculator UI, including display, buttons, theme toggle, and background effects.

classes.name: _BackgroundEffectPainter
classes.description: CustomPainter that draws background ellipse effects based on theme (light or dark).

classes.name: _ThemeToggle
classes.description: Custom toggle widget styled to match Figma design, toggling between light and dark themes.

classes.name: _KeysRow
classes.description: Widget arranging four calculator buttons in a row with fixed size and spacing.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method constructing the widget tree for the calculator screen.
